name: Space Ufo
description:
Hello everybody,my name is Rusen Sancak and I'm new to game development.Today I present to you my first game SPACE UFO
It's basically Flappy Bird Alternative but who play as bird!?
Be a UFO!
Think like you're gonna destroy your enemy planet!

Thanks for all support and comments :)
Your comment is important to me. Please comment! :)
More coming soon ...
Controls:
Click Left Click on mouse like a gun!
